_meanings:
{@--2@} Anointing, inaugurating
or consecrating by sprinkling water
(a king, idol &c.).

{@--3@} (Particularly)
Coronation, inauguration, 
installation (of kings); royal unction;
{#aTABizekaM raGuvaMSaketoH#} <ls>R. 14. 7.</ls>

{@--6@} Bathing or sprinkling
with water (of a divinity to whom
worship is offered).
